ComicInfo.Summary: The alien awakens resulting in a fight between him and the team. It is soon revealed that the alien is Sargasso, who worked with Titania's father in the 60's. The team is then attacked by a sabertooth tiger the tiger pulls Titania into a portal and they both disappear. Sam heads to New York to find a ring of fire in order to find Titania.
ComicInfo.Title: Ground Zero: Part 2
